user_stories.title: Build a CLI calculator
user_stories.description: Create a command-line calculator using clap that accepts two numbers and an operator (+, -, *, /) as arguments and prints the result. Handle division by zero with a proper error message.
acceptance_criteria: calc 10 / 0 outputs an error message instead of panicking
Unit tests cover all four operations and division by zero

technical_requirements: Use Rust with clap for argument parsing
Handle all arithmetic edge cases gracefully
All tests must pass with cargo test
